title: Oracle OAF Online Training

hero.title: Master Oracle OAF Online Training at Tech Leads IT
hero.shortDescription: Advance your career in Oracle ERP development with our expert-led Oracle OAF Online Training! Master core OAF (Oracle Application Framework) concepts, gain real-time hands-on experience, and build the skills needed to excel in today’s dynamic enterprise application landscape.

yourFutureBoss.title: Your Future Boss is Looking for Oracle EBS Experts!

sectionOne.title: Meet Your Trainer
sectionOne.shortDescription: Vijay is an Oracle-certified expert with over 16 years of experience in Oracle ERP and Technical consulting. As an Oracle University instructor and certified trainer, he delivers hands-on knowledge across Oracle OAF (Oracle Application Framework) development. He has completed 35+ batches, trained 16,000+ learners, and is known for his adaptive training style—be it corporate, online, or classroom. Vijay actively shares his expertise in the Oracle community, mentoring learners and staying up-to-date with evolving tech. Choose Vijay to guide your Oracle OAF journey with real-world technical insight and proven strategies for ERP success in Oracle OAF development.

faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle OAF Online Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle OAF Training covers essential modules including MVC Architecture, Java Basics, OAF Basics, Personalization, OAF Extensions, OAF Deployment, Migration, Real-Time Validation, and Practical Exercises. This hands-on training equips you with the skills needed to work confidently with Oracle Application Framework. A detailed syllabus is provided in our course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Live training sessions are conducted Monday to Saturday, 1 hour per day. This structured schedule ensures steady learning and practical experience in Oracle OAF development.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, weekend-only batches are not available. Classes are conducted from Monday through Saturday for consistent skill-building in Oracle OAF.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer recorded sessions for self-paced learning. Please note, live Q&A support is not available in the self-paced format for Oracle OAF training.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internships are provided based on mock evaluation performance. Internships involve real-time project work using Oracle Application Framework components.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No. Oracle OAF Training is offered as a complete package to ensure a thorough understanding of all framework components and best practices.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer resume building guidance focused on Oracle OAF roles, emphasizing your hands-on project experience and technical strengths.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes. A personal computer is required to install and practice using the Oracle Applications R12 environment and OAF components.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is needed. This Oracle OAF course is beginner-friendly. Basic database or Java knowledge is an advantage but not mandatory.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Yes. We begin with foundational concepts of Java and MVC before progressing to advanced OAF topics, ideal for both beginners and professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer full placement support including mock interviews, interview prep, and resume optimization tailored to Oracle OAF roles.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle OAF Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide expert guidance and study resources to help you prepare for Oracle OAF certification exams.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes. You’ll have 1-year access to all recordings and receive comprehensive notes, code samples, and reference documents for Oracle OAF topics.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We provide targeted interview questions and conduct mock interviews focused on Oracle OAF to prepare you for real job roles.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes. You’ll get 4 months of Oracle instance access with support for deploying and testing OAF-based components.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can rejoin any future batch of Oracle OAF Training within your 1-year course access period at no additional cost

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes. Upon completing the training, you’ll receive an official Oracle OAF Training Certificate from Tech Leads IT.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: Basic Java or SQL knowledge is helpful but not necessary. We cover all technical aspects from the ground up with practical OAF development.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, one-on-one sessions are available upon request. Fees for personalized Oracle OAF training vary based on the schedule.
